```{r test2, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(DT)
# library(lubridate)

library(dplyr)



skema <- tibble(indeks[,1],indeks[,2],indeks[,3])


colnames(skema) = c('Begreb', "Forklaring","Kapitel")


datatable(skema, rownames = FALSE, extensions = 'Buttons',class = 'cell-border hover compact', escape = FALSE,  options = list(searchHighlight = TRUE,pageLength = 18,dom = 'Bfrt',language = list(url = '////cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.20/i18n/Danish.json'),
    buttons = c('pdf', 'excel','copy', 'csv',  'colvis'),autoWidth = TRUE, columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-left', targets = 0:0))))%>%
  formatStyle('Begreb',  fontWeight = 'bold')%>%
  formatStyle(
  'Forklaring',
  target = 'row',
  color = styleEqual(0, 'white'),
  backgroundColor = styleEqual(c(0,8), c('lightgray',"red"))
)




```
